updateError: An error occurred while updating the profile
updateStatusError: An error occurred while updating the status
confirmMakePublic: Do you really want to make your account public?
confirmMakePrivate: Do you really want to make your account private?
deleteAccountWarning: This action will permanently delete your account and all your data. All tournaments you have created will also be deleted.
privateProfileMessage: This user has chosen to make their profile private. Details of their activity are not visible.
twoFactorDescription: Add an extra layer of security to your account
twoFactorSecurityDescription: Two-factor authentication adds an extra layer of security to your account by requiring a verification code from your mobile device.
installAppDescription: Download and install an authenticator app like Microsoft Authenticator, Google Authenticator, or Authy.
scanQRDescription: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app:
cantScan: Can't scan? Enter this code manually:
recoveryCodesDescription: Save these recovery codes in a secure place. You can use them to access your account if you lose access to your authenticator app.
verifySetupDescription: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app to complete setup:
twoFactorActiveMessage: Two-factor authentication is active on your account.
disableTwoFactorDescription: Enter a code from your authenticator app to disable 2FA:
